scripts.docker_rebuild: docker-compose kill && docker-compose rm -v -f && docker-compose up -d && docker-compose logs -f
scripts.test_docker_compose: npx nodemon --watch **/*.yml --exec "npm run docker_compose_down && npm run docker_compose_up"
scripts.gitUpdate: yarn gitSync && git add . && git commit -m "update docker-react-tryout," && git push
